text: Flirting is a form of human behavior from one person toward another person, or between two people, usually showing a sexual or romantic interest in the other person. It can include conversation, body language (such as winking), or short physical contact. ==Other websites== *SIRC Guide to Flirting *Nonverbal Courtship Patterns In Women: Context and Consequences *Psychology Today - Flirting Fascination â€“Reviews several studies on flirting Category:Communication
title: Flirting
